name: Save the setlers
description:
This is a tower defense game in which you have to defend a settlement from bloodthirsty creatures.
Crowds of enemies will help to beat off not only towers, but also soldiers who attack with special skills.
Some soldiers attack from afar, some heal, some slow down.
Also use magic that will deal damage or slow down enemies.
Dangerous spikes will deter enemies no less effectively. Enemies also come in different types.
Some fly, some attack from afar, some scatter into several weaker enemies.


-Dynamic gameplay
-Crowds of enemies
-Interesting gameplay
